system.description: Automatically equipped in each empty hand slot.

summary.value: You attack the target with your claws

system.description: You spend 1 Ultima Point to recover from all status effects and gain @GAIN[50 mp] .

You have improved defenses. Choose one of the following:

  • Your gain a +2 bonus to Defense and a +1 bonus to Magic Defense.

  • ÂŠYou gain a +1 bonus to Defense and a +2 bonus to Magic Defense.

You breathe a blast of your element onto your foes, dealing heavy elemental damage. It cannot be used again until its clock has been reset then completed again. The clock advances one section on each of your turns.

@UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.macros.W4p4Bd1FdTyBMzdt]{Improvised Damage}
At the start of each round, all your enemies take elemental damage. @DMG[3 fire]
One of your attacks gains the multi (2) property.

At the start of a Conflict, you immediately perform a villainous monologue on your enemies as you attempt to break their will. You make an opposed [WLP + WLP] check against a target of their choice. Depending on the outcome the following happens:

  • You win. All targets are @EFFECT[shaken] until they overcome your arguments. At the beginning of each round one of your targets may attempt a rebuke using the same check as above.

  • You lose. All targets gain @EFFECT[wlp-up], @EFFECT[dex-up] for 1 round.

With a start you rush forward and attempt to trample all your enemies in the field. Each of them must make a normal [DEX + INS] check or be trampled underfoot, taking the listed damage.

Any one of your targets may attempt to stop you with an opposed [MIG + MIG] check. If they succeed the action is disrupted, otherwise they are stunned and cannot take action on their next turn.

You make a melee attack on the target. If it hits and the result of the Accuracy Check was an even number, you automatically @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.adversary-creation.16fG18QR087xQw9l]{Grab} them and bring them up with you into the air until they break free or the end of your next turn.
Automatically equipped in each empty hand slot.

You launch into an overwhelming series of attacks against a target you have @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.MftLJFDNhnIRDsEN]{Marked} . You perform 3 free attacks against your target, treating your High Roll as 0 when calculating damage dealt by each attack.

You spend @LOSS[20 mp].
You mark a target for your next action. @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.MftLJFDNhnIRDsEN]{Marked}

summary.value: You have the ability to fly or levitate

effects.name: Flying
effects.description:
Your have ability to fly or levitate. Because of this, creatures on the ground cannot reach you with melee attacks as long as you are in mid-air (though you can perform melee attacks against targets who are on the ground).

If you suffer damage of a type you are vulnerable to, you are immediately forced to land and lose the benefits of this Skill until the end of the round, when you will automatically regain the benefits. You may also be forced to land when an attacker spends an opportunity.

Whenever you are in Crisis, you lose all benefits granted by this Skill.

effects.name: Powerful Body
effects.description: You are immune to weak and slow.

effects.name: Accuracy Check Bonus
effects.description: You gain a +3 bonus to your accuracy checks.

effects.name: Magic Check
effects.description: You gain a +3 bonus to your magic checks.

effects.name: Opposed Check Bonus
effects.description: You gain a +3 bonus to your opposed checks.
